definitions: able to be recovered or saved from faults or bad aspects

examples.text: they were misguided but ultimately redeemable

shortDefinitions: able to be recovered or saved from faults or bad aspects

definitions: (of a coupon, voucher, etc.) able to be exchanged for goods, a discount, or money

examples.text: the prize is not redeemable for cash

shortDefinitions: (of coupon, voucher, etc.) able to be exchanged for goods, discount, or money

definitions: (of a stock, bond, etc.) able to be repaid at the maturity date
shortDefinitions: (of stock, bond, etc.) able to be repaid at maturity date
